name: Iskandar: The Spear of Truth
description:
Iskandar: The Spear of Truth is a game of exploration , discovery and combat. Traverse different biomes, solve these puzzles and defeat the evil guardians of ancient treasure. Use your skills in real time combat to overcome the dark lord and return the land to peace.

The game includes :

  • 6 levels to explore
  •  A variety of enemies to defeat
  • Puzzles to complete
  • Detailed environments

AND MANY POTS TO DESTROY

Experience Survey - Please complete this survey to provide information on your experience playing our game.

Bug Report - Please report any bugs you find here using this link 

Any feedback is much appreciated and will go far in the development of our small game. Thank you
